definitions.text: periodic maintenance on a car or machine
examples: it was time for an overhaul on the tractor

definitions.text: the act of improving by renewing and restoring
examples: they are pursuing a general program of renovation to the entire property
a major overhal of the healthcare system was proposed
The sports car passed all the trucks

definitions.text: make repairs, renovations, revisions or adjustments to
examples: You should overhaul your car engine
